content.prompt: Which of the following best represents the views held by opponents to the womenâ€™s rights movement in the second half of the twentieth century?

choices.label: The original intent of the framers of the Constitution did not include citizenship for women.
Feminism threatens the traditional family unit, which is at the core of the social order.
The violent tactics used by members of the feminist movement illustrates the danger they pose to society.
Feminism makes the United States more vulnerable to communist attack.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
